testCase.bodyParameters:
topic = Inventory
Message type of Event = ObjectDeletion
ObjectDeletion.objectName = { (MD=md1; ME=me1; EH=eh1; EQ=eq1) }
ObjectDeletion.objectType = OT_EQUIPMENT
testCase.description: The EMS OS sends a notification to the BrokerOS. Only one OS has subscribed to receive this notification.

postconditions.success: The OS that has subscribed to receive this notification receives it.
postconditions.failure: The OS that has subscribed to receive this notification does not receive it.

tests.comments:
CommunicationPattern = SimpleResponse
CommunicationStyle = MSG
Only the tested parameters are represented.
